title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that the title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the hyperlink builder. 
2. Click on 'OK'. 
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
